name: Smash It Out
description:
This is a local multiplayer game for two players and one keyboard. The goal of the game is to push all your opponents stones down from the platform.

Controls:

Both players needs to use the same keyboard.

Player01:

- Hold down W to push the stone. 

- Press A or D to rotate direction.

- Press S to change stone.

Player02:

- Hold down The Up arrow to push the stone. 

- Press the Left or Right arrow to rotate direction.

- Press the Down arrow to change stone.

Good Luck and I hope you will have fun trying the game.
